name: Yagi-logper symmetric dipole array model

screenshots.caption: Antennavis display of the yagi-logper calculation.
pattern (H-plane) of 12-element Yagi at different freq.
Antennavis screenshot of the yagi-logper results.
pattern (E-plane) of 12-element Yagi at different freq.

short_description: finds exact gain, directivity and input impedance of Yagi or log-periodic antennas (planar symmetric array of cylindrical dipoles, many driven elements) for a range of specified frequencies, integrates 2D for segments on the same element, moment method
